item.title: Please lock; case solved
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:379096”][quote author=s w 3 3 t1 link=topic=474946.msg3472940#msg3472940 date=1295432069]
hey guys iv been remaking my bank and i wont to have a bank facing west and east i seen a few people say i need to ass -1 for west and -3 for east? i didn’t quite know how to add that into the command… this is what i go so far, it gave me to error’s

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2213, 3257, 3419, 0, 10); //bankbooth in bank west
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-3, 2213, 3250, 3419, 0, 10); //bankbooth in bank east

normally there wouldn’t be a (-1) or (-3) in a adding object command but since they said i need to add them to change the way it face’s i put it there, could someone please explain how i find out which way it faces and how i would add it to the command. thankyou.
[/quote]

0 = North
1 = East
2 = South
3 = West
-1 = West
-2 = South
-3 = East

So theres no different between 1 and -3, imo -3 is just a waste of time :)[/quote]

you, helping someone O_O

Read full topic
